formElement.htmlDocumentation: Filter the results to this team project. If your query string uses the @project macro (e.g. '[System.TeamProject] = @project'), you must specify the project.
formElement.documentation: Filter the results to this team project. If your query string uses the @project macro (e.g. '[System.TeamProject] = @project'), you must specify the project.
formElement.label: Project:

formElement.documentation: ID of the existing query. Either this or "Query Text" should be specified.
formElement.htmlDocumentation: ID of the existing query. Either this or Query Text should be specified.
formElement.label: Query ID:

formElement.documentation: The WIQL query string to run. Either this or "Query ID" should be specified.
formElement.htmlDocumentation: Query string in WIQL. Either this or Query ID should be specified.
formElement.label: Query Text:
Preview:
formElement.documentation: If checked, no data will be sent to the reporting system. Use this option to preview gathered data.

formElement.label: Debug:
formElement.documentation: If checked, the debug level will be set to "Debug".
